column17: R1 Can only run when authorised by Rail for London and only run or operate under Special Traffic Notice subject to any operational restrictions published within the notice R2 Prohibited North of EL264 (5M9Ch) R3 Not to exceed 25mph, 10mph on sections EL266-EL264 (UP) and EL264-Canal Jn (DN) Vehicle must be hauled if overall length of train is less than 80m due to risk of gapping
